p: The citral ratio (CR) was calculated in order to verify whether the nano-emulsification affected the ratio between the geranial and neral immediately after the process of its preparation. It was expressed as a function of the percentages of geranial/neral in the nano-emulsions, as follows: CR = %geranial/%neral %geranial= (Ageranial × 100)/Atotal %neral = (Aneral × 100)/Atotal where Ageranial is the area of geranial obtained by peak normalization, Aneral is the area of neral obtained by peak normalization and Atotal is the sum of Ageranial and Aneral.
